app.title: Petopia
app.description: Where pets find their perfect match.
app.welcome_message: Where pets find their perfect match.

onboarding.text1: Your community to find the perfect match for your pet.
onboarding.pet_selection_text: Select the types of pets you have or are interested in. This will help us personalize your experience.
onboarding.location_text: Let us know your location to show you nearby pets and events.
onboarding.interests_text: Select your interests to personalize the content you see in Petopia.
onboarding.text2: Explore profiles and find furry friends nearby.
onboarding.text3: Post photos and share stories with your community.
onboarding.text4: Your profile is personalized. Start discovering the Petopia community!
onboarding.location_permission: We need access to your location for a better experience
onboarding.location_set_text: Thanks for sharing your location! Now you can see nearby pets and events.

login.password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters long

register.accept_terms_required: You must accept the Terms and Conditions
register.description: Create an account to join the Petopia community.
register.password_length: Must be at least 8 characters long
register.password_lowercase: Must contain at least one lowercase letter
register.password_number: Must contain at least one number
register.password_placeholder: Min. 8 characters, uppercase, lowercase, number, special
register.password_special: Must contain at least one special character
register.password_uppercase: Must contain at least one uppercase letter
register.success_message:
Your account has been successfully created. 
A verification email has been sent.
register.terms_conditions: By registering, you accept our <Bold>Terms and Conditions</Bold> and <LinkPrivacy>Privacy Policy</LinkPrivacy>.
register.title: Register
register.username_min_length: Username must be between 3 and 20 characters

forgot_password.title: Forgot your password?
forgot_password.description: Enter your email and we will send you a link to reset your password.
forgot_password.success_message: If an account for {{email}} exists, you will receive a link to reset your password.

reset_password.title: Reset Password
reset_password.description: Create a new password for your account.
reset_password.new_password_placeholder: Min. 8 characters, uppercase, lowercase, number, special
reset_password.password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters long
reset_password.password_lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
reset_password.password_uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
reset_password.password_number: Password must contain at least one number
reset_password.password_special: Password must contain at least one special character
reset_password.password_confirmation_min_length: Password confirmation must be at least 8 characters long
reset_password.success_message: Your password has been successfully updated. You can now log in with your new password.
reset_password.generic_error: There was an error resetting your password. Please try again.
reset_password.invalid_link_message: This password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.

verify_email.loading_message: Please wait while we verify your email address...
verify_email.success_message: Your email has been successfully verified. You can now log in to your account.
verify_email.error_message: We couldn't verify your email. The link may be invalid or expired.
